Alternatively this are the locations for all 3rd party source:

FGS: https://github.com/soundsilence/ImageSmoothing

derivative5 and PeterKovesi directory:
http://www.peterkovesi.com/matlabfns/

piotr_toolbox:
https://pdollar.github.io/toolbox/

StructuredEdgeDetection:
https://github.com/pdollar/edges

colorspace.m
https://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/28790-colorspace-transformations
